Danganronpa: Despair's Horizon
♧ ─ ❀『Dorms (KG)』❀ ─ ♧ / house-of-creation
Residents: Wave, Wolfsbane, Lester, Momoka, Lucian, Jericho
Monokuma | Kev 2021-11-23 22:07:08Z
The house of creation. The building radiates power, light, and strength. With it's Greek architecture, it looks like an American monument. However, some bits of 21st century influence have been slided in, best examplified in the stained glass in the roof of the building. The stained glass is in the colors of the rainbow. Huge marble steps lead up to the main entrance of the building, and around that, large marble pillars. The huge open sky feels especially omnipresent around this building. After opening the door, a wave of light hits you. The inside has many windows, all of them being stained glass. A rainbow of different colors of light fills the room. A huge chandelier hangs from the roof of the house, shining even more light down. The four beds in here are sorted neatly in the four corners of the room, each with its own desk. Glass sculptures for decoration are strewn about, with clay blocks available for molding on each desk. Candles are attached to each pillar. A censer suspended with chains is hung up on the wall, with incense burning from it at all times. Interestingly, there's one huge table as a centerpiece for the room. A perfectly round and reflective table with models of constellations, stars, and planets in relation to earth. A bronze pole sticks out from the center of the table labelled "Earth". From there, structures made from bronze poles linked up together form constellations and galaxies around the earth. You can even spin the table around. "The stars... the sight of them makes me dream of universes upon universes."
Six desks and six beds are also in this house. For the house of creation, the bedframes and desks are made of marble with comfortable cushions. The desks contain pencils and sheets of paper. There's a small trash can as well. The four beds are evenly spaced throughout the dorm, each bed with its own desk and lamp, as well as wardrobe that holds clothes. Each desk and wardrobe is locked, and must be unlocked with a Monopad. These locks and the locks on the front door are the only semblance of technology in this place. A bathroom is also linked to here, containing a rustic toilet along with a somewhat working shower. The door does lock, and it's supposed to accommodate for all members of this house. Basic amenities are provided for everyone, despite the house being not so modern. For example, a 21st century sink, bath/shower, and toilet are provided with items like soap and toothbrushes. However, items like a hose from the 19th century that they used to wash out bathrooms are here. A razor from the 17th century seems dull and unsafe to use. Overall, you should be able to use the area. (edited)
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/751526893810876497/907907437389021184/IMG_1195.png

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 01:30:15Z
So the timesplit Lucian arrives here, looking around the place, it is nice and bright as he actually likes it. The stained glass remembering him of the chruches at home, which is partically the reason he chose this, he feels at home here. Safe, familiar and more than anything a thing he needed in those trying times. It gave him the tiny bit of reassurance he needed to actually be able to give back to the others properly. He wanted to be there to help after all. He cant do physical labor well, he doesnt have medical knowledgem hell he cant even hunt or do contruction so all he had going for him was logisitcs as in planning things out and his ability to talk to people and hopefully calm them down
The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 01:32:18Z
Ahhh so it is calm one is after? Well my good friend, I’m afraid calm is not what you’ll find here! For standing on one of the beds is the Great Jericho! He seems to be happy enough, though it’s hard to tell if the smile is genuine or one that’s glued to his face. He wanted to show everyone a performance but he hadn’t deemed such a wretched place worthy! But worry not for now isn’t the time for a show! Now is the time...for....INTENSE STANDING ON BED TIME WOO!
The Great Jericho || Crep 2021-12-05 01:32:26Z
( @Julian
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 01:37:22Z
Well he wanted just a tiny bit of peace but looking over he sees... a man who is very very eccentric. Not that Lucian really minded it, he knew that entertainers sometimes are... well in their head a little so he writes it off to that, quickly looking over before he goes back to sit down and take pen and paper to write a plan with all the supplies humans need, how to ration our resources and how to actually get food in case they dont get provided it freely here, basically ignoring poor Jericho as he thinks it´d be rude to stare at him for... standing on his bed, which isnt good for his bedsheets but its his bed so its his prolem... well for now. He will help him clean later probably
Julian 2021-12-05 01:37:24Z

The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 01:40:11Z
Jericho eventually noticed the man who had entered the room and to have simply....ignored the great Jericho?!? How could he?!? Jericho was one who had all eyes on him so how could someone dare to ignore him?! This shall not stand! Jericho jumped off of his bed, landing infront of the now sitting Lucian “I do see you’ve failed to notice me hmmm? Ahh this cannot stand my friend. Jericho doesn’t appreciate being ignored. Not at all nuh uh! But alas Jericho isn’t all that, he may be willing to forgive such an atrocious act in due time! For now though, consider yourself....A bad first impression!”
The Great Jericho || Crep 2021-12-05 01:40:13Z

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 01:45:36Z
Lucian was a tidbit confused by him just jumping off the bed to walk up to him, not bothered just a little bewildered by the energy the man has but all of that energy at least means that he has lots of energy and didnt seem to be too thraumatised. A good sign at least, causing Lucian to chuckle a little. "You want my attention? Fine. Its all yours now and its not a first impression, we have seen each other on the ship... well and in the cavern when we were chased by that weird dryad and when we saw..." Before bringing that back up Lucian would rather just tils his head a little at Jerichio, before tugging a little on his tie and glove to prop himself up "Ive already introduced myself when we first boarded to ship to everyone but if you need a refresher. Lucian D´Arc, prince, descendant of the saint Jean D´Arc who got burned for her faith. I take it you are Jericho?"

Despair's Horizon Bot BOT 2021-12-05 01:47:02Z
@The Great Jericho || Crep, @Julian got 1 interaction!
The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 01:49:49Z
Jericho pushed his glasses slightly upward and made sure his top hat was pointing straight up! “Ahh but a first impression to Jericho is ones first conversation! One doesn’t judge such a person on tv by their mere words but rather what goes on behind the camera! Ones public view verses a private one hmm?” “Alas Jericho forgets such introductions! He was too entranced by such events to pay much attention! Jericho appreciates a refresher however! Jericho shall not try to say all of that for it is quite the mouth blah. He never bothers with such acts like ‘price’ and saint. It bares no relevance to me you see! To Jericho you are merely a fan waiting to see my next performance! And speaking of performance...” “I am....The ultimate street magician....many of my fans gaze upon me with wonder and excitement! Always plotting where my next performance shall be! That is right! I am...the Great!” Jericho stands in a dramatic pose, even making sure to sway his cape for extra drama “Jericho!”
The Great Jericho || Crep 2021-12-05 01:49:58Z
( @Julian
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 01:58:55Z
For all the drama Jericho is putting up he isnt too wrong... maybe a little self-centered but that can be forgiven rather easily all things considered. "That bears some truth, people often act different in public and especially in front of cameras, although at times you have a limited frame of reference and need to make a few assumptions and." Lucian sighs once before looking back up at Jericho and thinking about magic.. well deception for entertainment is rather common and its admirable he seems so excited "It is truly fine. Many things happened so I cannot expect you to remember all of that, as for me being a fan awaiting your performance..... I cant say I have seen any up to now so I wouldnt even know if I would be a fan in the future but right now I dont fullfil the bare minimum requirement to be a fan of yours... which is having seen your work"
The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 02:02:48Z
“Tch! Tch I say! One needs to not read so much into Jerichos words! Often when Jericho speaks he doesn’t expect such detail upon his words! Alas this isn’t something negative so Jericho doesn’t mind! Though don’t worry either way. Jericho doesn’t care much for other people. He merely performs on the streets and allows people to enjoy his shows! There’s only one person in Jerichos life...and that’s Jericho himself!” “Ahhh but of course you haven’t! For with this act you seem to portray you seem to be very restrictive with what you may consider fun! Well worry not my friend! Jericho shall educate you on his performances at a later date! But one things for certain!” “You will be a fan soon. Everyone’s a fan of the Great Jericho.”
The Great Jericho || Crep 2021-12-05 02:02:50Z

Julian 2021-12-05 02:03:41Z

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 02:14:54Z
Okay... he has quickly taken a rather weird change in direction at first he seemed only a little self centered but Lucian didnt expect him to be that in love with himself, although throughout all of this he tells himself that he shouldnt judge the man too much. He is still entertaining people and that is good enough "If you dont want me to read into your words you might want to speak a little more bluntly, otherwise Ill have to interpret but I will always see the best in your words. I believe everyone is good by nature, no one was born bad or wants to do bad things for the reason of being bad. Also thats" Lucian is a little shaken up by the words... he thinks about how it would be if he only had himself and how empty and lonely he would feel swiftly shaking the thoughts off "Sad... try connecting with someone. It will teach you a lot, about yourself, the other person, the world in general and more things. Never be so busy as not to think of others. Everyone has worth and is the main person in their life or show if you can think of it better that way." Its a little tiresome with his insistence that Lucian will be his fan but if that is his way of saying friend he doesnt exactly mind it, he doesnt seem like a bad person after all. "My idea of fun? I like playing chess, Arts are really nice and other things, also" Lucian holds out his hand to Jericho as he gives a slight raise of the corners of his lips "Sure. Ill be your fan then, that way you neednt be so alone here, make sure to impress me plenty to actually keep that fan though."
The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 11:41:31Z
Seemed a little self centred? Jericho sees himself on the same level as god so he’s more than in love with himself. He’s mr protag in his eyes! “Ahhh but if Jericho were to speak so bluntly then how would conversation be fun! One must have some form of eccentricity in ones speech for speaking so bluntly leaves nothing to the imagination! Jericho is of course more than good. He’s not bad or anything else. He’s simply, Great!” Jerichos cocky smile would fade once he got called sad “How dare you! Jericho isn’t sad no no no! He’s quite happy with his status I’ll have you know! Jericho needn’t connect with someone for his performance is a solo act my friends! Always has been! Jericho has no fine for friendship blah. Perhaps people are the star of their show but...” Jericho looks up “Jericho is the only one with an audience always watching my friend. Which is why I must always perform!” he looks back at Lucian “Ahhh so you’re one of intellect Hm? Jericho hopes you’re not one to boast about such a fact. That’d be quite a shame.” Jericho goes to shake his hand but....then he retracts his hand “Needn’t be alone Hm? Are you implying that the great Jericho is alone? The Great Jericho is never alone.”
The Great Jericho || Crep 2021-12-05 11:41:35Z
( @Julian
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 13:05:25Z
"Make the conversation fun by being a good conversationalist. Although you might be right in literature and showbusiness speaking bluntly is usually not the best, so your speech suits you, I might take some time to get used to it." Lucian did not exactly mean to insult him but someone probably needed to tell him it... he wants to help even if its a little rudimentary, giving a soft exhale as he looks at Jericho with the needlessly serious face he usually has on "Thats good then. Although happy in this situation is... admirable? Maybe a little bewildering? We are still trapped here all together and.... sure" Lucian cant help but wonder what is going on in his mind... he is sure more eccentric than he thought anyone would be. But maybe thats his training to become a better diplomate "So you´ve always had to act on your own? I-I couldnt do that, I was never the best at being on my own and I dont think humans are made for that" He is really really trying to be as soft and gentle as he can be... his expressions easing up just a little bit as he starts humming a calming tune from his childhood, tapping the paper with his pen for a short bit before answering once more "If Im not here and we are the only ones here there is no need to perform no one would be watching but alas. I dare you, the great Jericho to perform a trick so grand not even the greatest magicians can successfully perform it" Lucian smirks for a short second thinking he checkmated the man "Show me who you really are. Find the strenght to perform in a role you arent exactly used to, not everyone can do this and if you are the greatest magician alive it should be easy right?" The hand being so close to his Lucian was about to grip down on it before it was retracted wondering why he would actually do that? Fear of connecting? "All I have are lessons and love so again do this. Go out into the world today and love the people you meet. Let your presence light new light in the hearts of people."
"For the last point. I wouldnt think about boasting. Humility is a virtue and if you know who you are neither praise nor insult can touch you" Lucian said almost graceful, serene. He was fully confident in what he was saying, its the thing he firmly beleives after all "Do you feel alone? You are only ever really alone if you lose faith, in whomever. If you feel lonely come talk to me. I might not be the best person in your book but I will try my best to be there so, give yourself a push" He extends his hand again with a small smile on his face, he hasnt given up on the man. He will never give up on anyone
Julian 2021-12-05 13:08:49Z

The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 13:45:41Z
“Jericho isn’t one for conversation my friend. He merely performs infront of the crowd and vanishes before their eyes. Many a reporter dream of finally questioning the great Jericho but alas, he always escapes their cameras and blasted microphones.” he seemed to not like the idea of cameras and reporters. Funny right? “One may have to get used to Jericho but Jericho shall not change himself for the sake of others. What you see is what you get with the great Jericho! So my friend, i hope you get used to it rather quickly.” he said, the cocky smile now returning “Ahhh but who said the great Jericho was happy! He’s quite...annoyed his performances shall be delayed but! But but but! He shall prosper! For Jericho always comes out on top! Jericho shall also mention that he doesn’t blame you for thinking Jericho is admirable! Luckily for you Jericho does do autographs in a rare occasion!” he said with a slightly egotistical tone, it was hard to tell if he was joking or not when Jericho heard ‘so you’ve always had to act on your own’ it seemed to have struck a nerve. One of his gloved hands tightening into a fist as his cocky smile once more fades into a rather annoyed look. Though he doesn’t make any comments about it. Just a slight ‘Tch’ sound “Jericho prefers to be alone in solitary whilst he’s not performing.” he eventually says, not bothering much to elaborate now that he’s annoyed “Gah! The great Jericho is the greatest magician alive! To think one could even think of matching Jerichos skill is preposterous! Blasphemy! You dare to force Jerichos hand to perform?! Well my friend I’m afraid I have some rather sad news. Jericho doesn’t perform in such conditions. He doesn’t show a single trick to a single someone. He shows multiple tricks to multiple everyones! No private shows! He’s not just some clown for hire I’ll have you know!” “Jericho already is showing you who he is! He is the great Jericho! This is the role Jericho was born to fulfil!”
“Jericho is used to many a role! He’s performed everywhere and anywhere! It shall be easy! But like said no private shows! Only once everyone is gathered shall Jericho prove to you all what’s what!” “Gah Jericho must say with all this talk about love and lessons you seem to be quite the unexciting fellow my fellow! Jericho isn’t here to put light into people’s hearts but to merely perform for his audience above!” “Jericho? The GREAT Jericho? Boasting? Why I never! Jericho isn’t one of egotistical nature! He is quite humble I’ll have you know! Jericho doesn’t feel alone! He never has and never will! Jericho doesn’t quite understand where you’re coming from but Jericho needs no push of any kind. Though such an offer is acknowledged.” after that comment before about always acting on his own he shall not be shaking hands.

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-05 14:09:27Z
"You arent? Why are you talking to me then? And you previously said you always perform, so are you not performing right now or are you performing for me and me only?" Lucian knows pushing him might feel really bad for him short term but it is the right thing to do long term, it might help him grow after all and he is happy to be a catalyst for that "Ill do fine, I have talked to a great many of people for the longest time, all types so I am decently adaptable for that reason, Ill do well enough, although annoyance is still a little not much for such a situation but keep up the cheerful attitude, its refreshing." Lucian did after all slowly get used to this. He knew about what he had to do and while it wouldnt be stroking his ego it would ultimately be the healtiest thing for Jericho, looking at his reaction to the comment meaning he has hit something, although he doesnt know how much further he wants to push him "You do? Well good to see you seem to be interested enough to talk to me" And there Jericho goes again boasting about his skill for the longest time, although this wouldnt be Lucians issue who is just sitting there listening calmly while writing some more logistics down on his paper "Again. You said you are always performing a few seconds ago and what really is the difference between making one person happy and making multiple people happy? In the end you still did a good thing no matter to how many people, not many people are willing to do the small things in life." "I think I should drop this subject, after all I doubt you are particularly enjoying this, Ill see in due time what is going on. So Ill look forward to the future." Out of all the things Jericho says this is the thing that puzzles him the most "You arent there to light up peoples life? What are you doing then? Performing for yourself? If thats the case why even need the audience if not to prove something to yourself? But I am sure you have your reasons" Lucian adds with a smile.
"And. That is totally fine" Lucian takes back his hand after being declined twice, his expression unchangingly kind for what he usually does "If you dont feel alone that is well and you dont need to understand, just know I offered and the offer is an offer for that reason. It can be declined wth no hard feelings behind it."
The Great Jericho BOT 2021-12-05 14:19:58Z
“Im merely talking to you because you dared to ignore my presence as the great Jericho and now we’re communicating for the sake of it I guess! Tch- look my friend! The life of Jericho in itself is the show! But if I were to perform a trick for you, then multiple others would miss out on the great jerichos art! But I must say you’re becoming rather bothersome my pushy friend.” The more he spoke to Lucian the more annoyed he seemed to get. To Jericho he figured Lucian was simply always aiming to be the bigger/better man...but no ones better than Jericho! Apparently... “Jericho would presume you’ve spoken to many a people, though he can guarantee Jericho is one of a kind Hm? Of course! No need to answer! Jericho is unique and better in every way! Yes! That’s the only possible explanation!” “You’re trying to make it seem like I’m some hero my friend! Though if it makes you feel better it’ll be the same throughout this whole place. Everyone here is just a mere fan of my work. There’s no need to make it anything more or less in the eyes of Jericho.”

Jroncher jronk Jhronicles 2021-12-06 13:33:08Z

@Julian
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-06 13:41:42Z
Lucian was nodding at the request, fully opening the door as he walks alongside the long halls, the colorful glass letting the light shine through as the reflected light shines through him, going through all the colors of the rainbow moving on through the long golden halls "Yeah. Come on in. Do you need anything? Ill gladly help"
Jroncher jronk Jhronicles 2021-12-06 13:46:06Z
Daisuke closed it behind him and stood in the entryway, just… looking around… It was so fancy. And so different from his house… They liked theirs more. They weren’t jealous. “It’s bright in here…” He squinted a bit at first, and then just closed his right eye completely. It was a lot better, now. “I do need something, though! I am looking for a short raccoon boy. Swears a lot. Has a tail… That sort of thing. Do you know where he is? Is he here?”
@Julian

Him just smiling back "It is. And I am rather happy for it. I do enjoy the light, I see it as a gift from above, it shows me the love I recieve all the time and reminds me to love back."

Daisuke turned around to see if he’d missed those possible footprints, but only saw his own, leading back to the door and outside again. Jroncher jronk Jhronicles 2021-12-06 14:22:33Z

Daisuke wouldn’t say it out loud as it could be seen as a weakness, but the light made it much harder for him to see out of his ruined eye. It wasn’t too bad with the other, but the actual act of having one eye constantly closed when usually having it open was irritating. Julian 2021-12-06 14:43:11Z
@Jroncher jronk Jhronicles
Jroncher jronk Jhronicles 2021-12-06 15:01:22Z
“Mmm…” Daisuke reached forward and grabbed the clay on Lucian’s desk. He started to mould it as he spoke. “Feeding so many people will be really hard… And we don’t know how far out we are… We could have been knocked out for days… It could take ages to reach mainland… Actually having the room to fit enough food to feed everyone on the raft will be difficult… Cooking will be a pain, too… There’s a chance this place is an archipelago, though, which would be fine because we could hopefully be able to stop at other islands to get supplies like food and water. I’ll see if I can see any nearby islands from higher up later. In a situation like this, though, it’d be stupid to try stick to something like vegetarianism. I know it could be hard for some people, but it’d be way too dangerous to attempt it without the energy and stuff from meat. They could easily get ill or weak. As for what I can do… Well that depends on what you need me to do.” He didn’t look away from the clay the whole time, slowly transforming the lump into something that resembled a dinosaur. A stegosaurs to be more precise.
@Julian
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-06 15:11:50Z

(I am very confused sorry) as he took note of everything that was said "Well the feeding shouldnt be too much of an issue, if the person who brought us here and died is to be trusted we should be close enough to the japanese border... hopefully if the ship wasnt carpered... which we have no way of checking." Lucian adds.. he has an idea on how to determine their position "Once night falls we can look at the northstar and other starts to get an estimate of our location, cooking wont be required if we prepare well and it is indeed a short voyage. We can try dried meats and fruits for that, anything hat keeps for a while." On the note of vegetarianism he looks at his notebook and sighs "I havent exactly found many sources of meat besides an aviary... although that could be a little iffy all things considered, I dont know if all of those birds are actually worth trying to eat based on thier structure, but their eggs should be fine hopefully. I dont really know what I need you to do secifically and I will admit that I am not at all useful in a survival situation as I have no knowledge on anything that could help us out except maybe geography. But I can organise and do logistics. Well and try to keep everyone in a decent state of mind to the best of my abilities"

Jroncher jronk Jhronicles 2021-12-06 16:02:26Z
"Well, last time I checked, Japan wasn't too close to any jungles... I doubt there'd be one just off the coast, either. To end up on a place like this... It'd take a while... Even longer without motors and such. And since I doubt the panda would give us one of those, it could take ages to get back to Japan with only the paddles. The stars could help, though. We should be able to guess where we should head to find the closest bit of inhabited land, because as soon as we find civilisation, we should be good. Hope's Peak won't want their precious students stuck on a primitive little island for long... I feel like it could take a few days, though... It'd be useful if you could try narrow down where we are, though" "But there's meat everywhere, really. You just need to look. I bet if you tried hard enough you'd see all sorts of things. I've already seen a boar. And snakes are very edible. Even people if you're desperate, but I think it's too late to try salvage anything from the guide man. We could be here for a while if we try to cure meat, though... I'm not sure if we'll have enough time. I suppose if we start now it could be done... We'll probably have to rely more on fishing, other small islands, and foraged things like berries and roots..." The stegosaurs was more detailed now!! Now nice. It almost looked done.

Monokuma | Kev 2021-12-20 22:36:50Z
Click. Clack.
In the center of the room, the large circular table with the model of the stars starts rotating. The table is separated into three rings, all rotatable, and one center circle in the middle of them all.
The outermost ring is a bronze ring labelled "Universum, focus idearum." There are various studs throughout the ring, representing stars and other celestial bodies. No bronze poles stick out of this ring.
The middle ring is a ring labelled "Sidera lator inspirationis." This ring has various star systems etched into it; recognizable ones like the Big Dipper can be seen. Some bronze poles stick out of this one: the gas giants in the solar system.
The center ring is a ring labelled "Fundationes in vita." This ring has the terrestrial plants in it, with the largest and most prominent one being Earth. It's the only planet here that has a moon (even if the real life ones do have moons.) It's conveniently labelled "Terra".
Lastly, the middle of the table contains one large bronze sphere, sticking out from the table. You can even rotate it around in it’s pocket. There's a large keyhole inside it. It’s labelled: “Sol”.
Regardless, the table is now moving around on it’s own. What the heck?

Monokuma | Kev 2021-12-20 22:42:02Z
*The planets seem to open up as they spin around, revealing objects hidden inside each planet. For Mercury: a singular small screw. For Venus: A small pointed needle tw: n//dl/s. For Earth: A small plate that has around 2 and a half inches for its circumference. It’s colored yellow. For Mars: A large metal plate that seems to be an counterpiece for the one in Jupiter. It’s more or less the same, other than a knob at the peak of the bowl and a small spot for a screw to come in at one of the edges. For Jupiter: A large metal plate that’s the largest object here, and has a circumference of around 4 inches. It curves up at it’s edges, forming a bowl shape. There is also an indent for a screw at one of the edges. For Saturn: A small circular ring that’s slightly larger than the plate (and fits around it) with 4 indents on its cardinal directions. For Uranus: Another small needle tw: n\dl\s. It’s smaller than the one in Venus, and is able to latch on to the other one. For Neptune: A handle that fits neatly into the knob on the Mars plate. So what the heck is going on here?

"It is not that they actually let in a different color of light but they block every light color but that and that is why we see it like that, if you add every color you get white."
Wave BOT 2021-12-25 01:16:06Z

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2021-12-25 01:18:30Z

Kaboom, solved problem, no?” She added emphasis on the kaboom, mostly for fun. “Also have I not already heard from people of this house? You live here, don’t you?”
Lester Warburton BOT 2021-12-27 18:53:17Z

Lucian D'Arc BOT 2022-01-11 01:22:36Z
And so Lucian walks back in, drenched by the rain but he didnt seem to care? In fact he was walking easier than he had before like a burden was taken off his shoulder. He slowly walked through the pathway of stained glass, the clouds not giving it the usualy glow, the incense he liked so much he just looked at a split second before walking on, thats the past. He is reassessing the things he knows right now. But nonetheless he walks onwards... it is a long hallway, reminiscent of home, a place that always sort of felt like a cage. A cage he thought he was happy in, and maybe still might be if he returns to it. But he was snatched out of the golden nest now. Forcefully and too quickly, but if he hadnt it wouldve became his cage for life, like it was his fathers and the cage of the father of his fathers. Once he finally reached the closet he sighed, it is almost only the same stuff, white and gold, his skin and his hair, a perfect fit for the countries perfect little angel. A gracious and giving person with no darkness in sight. Although he knows how to make do, there isnt only white, there are suits and they can be tailored for use. Or... black shirts, those work as well. So with those in tow Lucian slowly makes his way to the sink, with scissors in hand as he sits down and sighs "I guess that is my first real act of rebellion."

Wolfsbane BOT 2022-01-11 01:40:01Z
He was sitting off somewhere in the house. He had locked himself into isolation for awhile. The only time he left was to cook food for a certain someone’s party, but he couldn’t bring himself to actually go to said party. Not with the way he was. He’ll have to apologize later for that… He was sitting there, looking at a wall. Nothing more. Though… He had his prosthetic arm off. It was no longer attached to his shoulder. He also had his sweater and tailcoat off, being completely shirtless. His prosthetic leg remained on though, same with his other articles of clothes and accessories. He found himself getting up and walking to a mirror, assuming one is where the sink is, he stops in his tracks as he sees Lucian. What poor timing. He kinda just stands there staring… Before finally saying, “What…? Rebellion…?” He looks at Lucian, perplexed.
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-11 01:48:25Z
Thoughts, thoughts… everyone was stuck in their thoughts. Even Momoka, as she was all alone for a while, and that wasn't much good. Laid back in bed all this time, she seemed somehow out of it herself. Thankfully, even like this, it didn't take much for her to snap back. All that was needed was an appropriate distraction… Perfect. Attention drawn to the scene happening by the sink, she hopped up and away, sneaking up on the two with a curious air. With the dark clothes and scissors in his hands, Momoka could only arrive at one conclusion. "…Psst. If you ask me, I think he's entering his goth phase…" She whispered to Wolfsbane, before taking a few steps closer to the prince himself, a hand on his shoulder. "Hey! Prince Charming! Whatcha doing? Iiii'm guessing you know how to use those things?" She asked, referring to the scissors.
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2022-01-11 01:54:51Z
The party wasnt really a thing he would´ve wanted to attend, neither is it a thing Lucian was not proud of. One of many here, life really is more difficult if people insist on being a roadblock to your every effort. Upon being asked by two people Lucian sort of just sighs as he looks back. "I am changing up some things, I have decided I dont like the way things are looking" A rather obvious thing saying to the scissors and Lucian had no idea on how to use them but now wouldnt be the time to really admit that, nor would he admit it overall. He didnt feel like doing that. "Its scissors, how difficult can it be. Hair grows back anyways." And with that SNIP. The first of many cuts as some of the golden locks fall into the sink, Lucian letting out a small laugh at it. Its not like the hairs were burden and he let them go... its more, he finally did something on his own accord, not ordered to or schooled to do it. He did it because he wanted to "Rebellion. I have been stuck in the golden birdcage for too long. People have to adjust to survive right? So my first act of rebellion is a visual adjustment." More snips. Lots and lots of snips.
Wolfsbane BOT 2022-01-11 02:02:20Z
He sighs at what Momoka said, seeing the accuracy in her words. He no way had the will to deal with someone going through their angst phase. He’s already had to deal with that a few times over. He kinda just watched Lucian cut his hair, not intervening. He probably should. This can only go so wrong, especially since giving yourself a haircut is way harder than giving someone else one. Takes time and skill to properly cut your own hair without it looking somewhat off or choppy. Wolfsbane would know. No matter, this isn’t much of business, so he just moves closer to a mirror, looking at himself. Looking at who he is now. Without the arm. The nub that remains of it. He sighs, before looking to Lucian. “Your first act of rebellion, huh? You sound like a character in some teen drama… Just, fancier in wording.”
Despair's Horizon Bot BOT 2022-01-11 02:07:27Z
@Tomo <3, @Julian, @Momoka 💖 | Shiny got 1 interaction!
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-11 02:09:26Z
For a moment or two, she kinda just stared at Lucian like as he went at it. She was a model, not any kind of stylist, but she definitely knew a thing or two; and this was not it. Suddenly in a bit of a panic, she stepped forward and grabbed his hand that held the scissors. "Nononono! I mean, I, like, reaaaally don't get what you just said but you, uhh… so totally do not have a plan here, am I right?" To her, as someone who could get easily caught up in both her own and others' appearances, this was some kind of tragedy. "If you wanna do this, can you give me a shot at it? Pleeeease?? Your hair is, like, way too pretty for this…"
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2022-01-11 02:16:13Z
Lucian just sighed and put the scissors down. For a second. At first he was surprised by how perceptive Momoka is, the first mini comment was a thing that surprised him so he lets out a hearty chuckle "You are very perceptive Momoka" That was genuine praise but he would give it more thought later. So he also has to address the concerns of Wolfsbane, he was not entering a goth or Angst phase... it was more of a him trying to figure things out phase. Whenever he looked at the mirror he saw someone he doesnt think he could be, someone too shiny for his own good. "Do I? Maybe I do lack taste in some regards. But you neednt worry, I am not going to get angry or sad, that doesnt suit me. I just decided to not let people step over me anymore.... I cant do that after messing up the party so badly, it was chaos and for that I should apologise to you Wolfsbane." Momoka is actually lucky, he hasnt done much. Just a few small snips, well besides the first one that was rather heavy, but the others were all small and careful cuts. "Sure Momoka, you can try it. You are likely better at it anyways."
Wolfsbane BOT 2022-01-11 02:26:15Z
He glanced away. “No need to apologize… I wasn’t even there, which was my bad… I… Couldn’t be there… At least not in the moment. So don’t worry much.” Though he has zero clue what actually occurred at the party. He was slightly confused on how the party got messed up, but decided to not address it. Seeing as that’s part of what’s caused this want of change for Lucian. He looks to Momoka. “Do you know what you’re doing? Like actually? Cause if not I think it would be best if I did it. I have experience with… Hair…” He slightly flushed. “…And makeup, and nail polish… Maybe other things. You know, uh, kids like that kind of stuff.”
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-11 02:35:58Z
As she looked at Lucian's hair, trying to come up with something she could do, she tuned out the conversation. It seemed she may have missed something important, which was a shame, but it wasn't her business to pry. Oh well. For now, she was just relieved that she managed to stop this hair mess, and a few ideas were coming to mind... Just as Wolfsbane began speaking to her, she picked up the scissors. "Oh! Weeelll, it's been a minute since I've cut hair, but I have experience, yeah!" She smiled, tilting her head at his other comments. "Haha. You kiiinda look like you wanna do it, so I think I can cut you a deal! So, I have some makeup I picked up during the first motive, aaand an appropriate amount would maybe suit Prince Charming's new look. What would you rather do, hm?"
Lucian D'Arc BOT 2022-01-11 02:41:39Z
He just shakes his head slightly. It wasnt Wolfsbanes fault. "If anyone comes here asking for Lester it might be smarter to say he isnt here, he made a few enemies I´d say." That is quite the understatement. Lester poured coffee over someone and kicked them in the balls but alas. "I saw the issue, I was just preoccupied with different things. Its a fault of mine, being an overachiever." Thats also spoken mildly, he is a perfectionist by nurture, although he seems to be letting loose as he sits down While Momoka speaks about actually fully redoing his look he is a little confused. "No. No no no. Im not a dolly to dress up. This is about emancipation." Protest! Lucian is protesting against it for a little while, although it is rather obvious it is a nervous sort of smile and he will submit to Momokas request if she pushes it.
Wolfsbane BOT 2022-01-11 02:49:51Z
“Lester, huh?” He sighs. “Gotcha. Not like I care much for him after all… And, it really isn’t your fault, whatever Lester did. Can’t expect to be able to do everything. Not everything will be perfect either.” He says to Lucian. His words ran hollow. He, still bashful, would grin slightly at Momoka. “Well… If that’s the case, I’ll uh, gladly do Principito’s makeup. Royalcat08 2022-01-17 06:13:14Z
"....Rightttt...." She sighs, a bit unwrapping the bandages. "Dunno. You'll be able to grab stuff at the least but I wouldn't do anything to tough. Don't hit anymore stages or anyone." She gently grabs his hand and wraps the first one quickly. It's a practiced motion, and for not a doctor, she's skilled. She carefully wraps up most of his hand, before moving onto the second one. "Keep it like this for at least a day, I can come change the bandages if needed, but most of these cuts are minor, if you just keep it elevated and clean you'll be fine." Having finished bandaging the second one she grabs the ice pack wrapped in tissues. "Hold this between your hands to ease the swelling. Put it down for a bit if it starts to get too numb but then repeat. It'll help the swelling but." She pauses, "Keep the ice pack wrapped in tissues so you don't get those bandages wet from condensation. Okay?"

Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-27 00:13:25Z
"One sec…" She pulled the monopad out, allowing the door to unlock. Honestly, most times she forgot she had it. "This thing is like… everything-proof, huh? Aaanyway, you can go put me down over there so you can work your magic," she smiled lightly, pointing to a corner with a bed and some other stuff that indicated she lived there. "I dunno why, but it's been, like… quieter lately. Sooo… less disturbances for you or whatever, hehe."
Momoka 💖 | Shiny 2022-01-27 00:13:29Z
@bastard
Akuza Caleshi BOT 2022-01-27 00:21:05Z
Akuza nods, swinging open the door with his foot as he places Momoka down on her bed. "I guess zhat vould help me keep focus on your vounds. I do apologize if zhis hurts a vit, however vear vith it...please." They then pull out some supplies, and get to treating Momoka's burn wound on her leg first! "Zhankfully zhe cream zhat I made for burns vasn't damaged during zhe battle undervater..." They start to apply the cream gently, their funky blue and pink eyes glowing faintly.
bastard 2022-01-27 00:21:06Z
@Momoka 💖 | Shiny
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-27 00:31:48Z
She nodded, taking a deep breath as he started to work on it. "No no, don't worry. Do whatever you gotta." It hurt, but probably not nearly as much as it would if the wound was left unattended; that thought helped her stay still and moderately happy. "Oh, by the way… you have really pretty eyes. I've never seen ones like that."
Momoka 💖 | Shiny 2022-01-27 00:31:52Z
@bastard
Akuza Caleshi BOT 2022-01-27 01:02:05Z
The sudden compliment surprised Akuza a bit, making him fumble a bit with the cream. There was a clear blush on his face, trying to focus clearly on trying to treat her wound. "Z-Zhank you. Zhey really aren't...anyzhing too special. Razher, zhey're often a vit of a curse zhan anyzhing else."
bastard 2022-01-27 01:02:06Z
@Momoka 💖 | Shiny
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-27 03:51:42Z
She giggled a bit at his reaction, although the fumbling with the cream did make her wince a bit. Overall, worth it. "Curse…?? What do you mean by that?" She put a faux-serious face on. "Has some kind of magical evil been inflicted on you, in a flash of misfortune?"
Momoka 💖 | Shiny 2022-01-27 03:51:46Z
@bastard
Akuza Caleshi BOT 2022-01-27 15:18:13Z
Seeing her flinched, Akuza mutters under his breath. "Sajnálom." Though he lets out a small chuckle when she starts talking about magic. "No, nozhing like zhat. It's simply my eyes struggle to see in zhe light, vhich is vhy I often vear my eye mask. It helps cover up my eyes from having to see zhe light and get damaged even more."
bastard 2022-01-27 15:18:14Z
@Momoka 💖 | Shiny
Momoka Hanasaki BOT 2022-01-27 16:50:58Z
She nodded, now seeming to understand. "I seeee… yeah, that makes sense. Ehe, sorry, I don't really think about things that way." As in, a harsh, realistic reality. Regardless, she continued to smile. "Your mask is really cute, buuut it's a shame you have to cover your nice eyes up…"
Momoka 💖 | Shiny 2022-01-27 16:51:06Z
@bastard

bastard 2022-01-27 22:48:12Z

I'm used to treating my own vounds, namely burn vounds, so...Plus, zhey only really hit my clothes so I doubt zhat zhere's any real...burns."
bastard 2022-01-28 10:31:05Z

In the house of creation, Katsuro grabbed his old hoodie, and the spray cans he had left behind. Looking to Lester's bed, he walked over to it, sitting next to it. "...Wester... it... hasn't even been a day, I know, but... I... I'm already breaking promises we made... they... all want to release the curse... I couldn't stop them..." He stared in silence for a bit, as if waiting a response, before giving a sigh. "...If... everyone suffers... I can't be happy... but... I'll try my best to remember you. I'll make sure of it. I'll paint a picture when I can... if I can..." Looking down to the ground, he decided to begin, spraying paint all over it. The drawing of a white haired man, the one who was known as Lester. "...At least I can make that promise happen. What do I do..." Hopelessness filling his heart and a new guilt settling in, tears started falling down again, him sitting against the bed and putting his head into his arms, hugging his knees. "...I'm sorry... I'm sorry... I'm sorry..." ...He repeats the words, the guilt of having betrayed the dying wishes of someone close to him overtaking him, all the conviction, hope, everything that he had built moments ago crashing down.
Jagiest 2022-03-13 23:55:29Z

Katsuro Taira 🎨 ☆Est☆ 2022-03-13 23:57:51Z
"...Sniff... I... I don't want to go to a world like that... a horrible world... if I'll just hurt big sis or be hurt by her, when I see her... what's the point..." He thinks for a bit, before sniffling. "...They can leave... then... if they want to go to a bad world... I'll stay here... there's no point... I... I can live happily here... and... if everything is okay... I can just leave thanks to the people here... yeah... I can just paint here... and eat... and everything... it'll be... all okay." Will it, though... He stomps that thought from his brain as he has his plans set for if they do decide to destroy it. "...If the world is gonna be awful... I don't... wanna be part of it... no more... no more..."

Katsuro Taira 🎨 ☆Est☆ 2022-03-14 00:03:30Z
"...A-ah..." He seems to snap out of whatever he was in now, shaking his head. "...Wh-what was I... even thinking... I... y-you're right... I... sniff... I have to... I have to go... and... I... I have to try and save everyone..." Getting up, he wipes his eyes before heading out with his objects, looking back out to the bed. "...Thank you, Wester... I'll... keep our promises. This time, for sure."
